title: #101: Going Rogue | Rogue Ways Swapcast
description:
Lindsey Scharmyn of the Rogue Ways Podcast joins the show to help to break down the current state of affairs happening inside the United States as the new year begins.

We discuss how the year 2020 was used as a conditioning operation to institute behavior modification programs for the masses, and how the public dealt with those changes. Everything was turned upside down.

However, it isnâ€™t just a new year that is starting, but a new American presidential administration as well as a new Age in the astrology world. Could 2021 be the year that the people take their power back, or will the march towards the world government continue at a record pace?
